xml.p: Introduction: "Oh! Aren't you the one who just moved in?#$b#I'm Maru. I've been looking forward to meeting you!$h#$e#You know, with a small town like this, a new face can really alter the community dynamic. It's exciting!" #!String
Resort_Entering: "Willy mentioned that you helped fix the boat. Thanks for doing that!" #!String
Resort_Leaving: "That was fun!" #!String
Resort: "I've been noticing a few different starfish species. My favorite are the big purple ones, but they're all very interesting!" #!String
Resort_Towel: "*gasp*... It's a solar eclipse!$3#$b#Oh... nevermind. It's just your body blocking the sun." #!String
Resort_Towel_2: "We're so far removed from civilization out here.#$b#Imagine the stars you could see at night.#$e#Who knows, maybe we'd even see a flying saucer or two!$h" #!String
Resort_Bar: "Mmmm... Why are tropical fruits so good?" #!String

Resort_Shore: "I wonder if Willy would let me bring my telescope here sometime...#The sky is so clear here, I bet I could spot Pelican Town out in the horizon.#Maybe I'd even see you running around %farm Farm!" #!String
danceRejection: "I'm flattered! But... No." #!String
divorced: "We have nothing to say to each other.$a" #!String
breakUp: "Not good enough for you, huh?$a#$b#Fine...$s" #!String
dumped_Girls: "You've got some nerve, speaking to me!$a" #!String
secondChance_Girls: "You've lost some respect with me, @... but I'm willing to forgive you.$s" #!String
Mon: "Whenever I'm struggling with a technical problem, I always take a walk.#$e#It's surprising how much a change of scenery can help." #!String
Tue: "Have you met my mother? She's the town's carpenter." #!String
Wed: "On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harvey's clinic.#$b#He says he likes having me around in case his medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?" #!String
Thu: "I plan on spending a lot of time with my telescope this summer." #!String
Sat: "Do you know my Dad, Demetrius? He's a scientist. I have a lot of fun helping him out in the laboratory." #!String

Fri: "Hey, sorry if I seem cranky... I'm a little sore from work yesterday.#$c .5# I had to carry ten boxes of medical files to the attic!#$e#I had to sort patient records for four hours straight! " #!String
Sun: "Hi!#$q 3/4 Sun_01_old#Do you have fun working on the farm?#$r 3 0 Sun_01_01#Yes.#$r 4 0 Sun_01_02#No." #!String

Sun_01_old: "$p 3#Hey, you've made another week of progress on the farm! It seems like things are going well for you.$h|Another tiring week on the farm, huh? It must really be a lot of work...$s" #!String
Sun_01_01: "Well that's good, isn't it?$h" #!String
Sun_01_02: "Yikes! I'm sorry. Have you ever thought of doing something different...?$s" #!String
Tue2: "Stop by our house when you need to upgrade your buildings.#$e#It's always nice to have visitors." #!String
Fri4: "My mother is a carpenter and my dad is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets." #!String
Mon6: "Sometimes my head gets so cluttered with nonsense I can hardly think. Does that ever happen to you?#$e#Getting some fresh air usually helps." #!String
Wed8: "I work at Harvey's clinic on Tuesdays and Thursdays.#$e#He's nice, but not really my type..." #!String
Thu10: "Oh, @! Is there anything you want to talk to me about?$l" #!String
Event_Hospital_1: "Of course he'll know the difference! This sample is completely ruined!%fork$s" #!String
Event_Hospital_2: "Okay. I'll blame it on you, then.$u" #!String
Event_Hospital_3: "You're right. I should just tell him the truth.%fork$u" #!String
Event_Space1: "It's amazing, isn't it?" #!String
Event_Space2: "I guess you could see it like that...$s#$b#But it's still incredible, isn't it?" #!String
Event_Cut1: "Oh no?$8#$b#Well, that makes me feel a little better, then. Thanks." #!String
Event_Cut2: "Oh no! Aghh... I'm really really sorry.$s" #!String

event_robot1: "Thanks. That means a lot to me, @.#$b#I know gadgets aren't really your kind of thing... but I do appreciate that you're showing interest in what I do.#$b#I wish I could return the favor somehow.$l" #!String
event_robot2: "What? After she said point-blank that she doesn't want to be a slave? How cold...%fork$a" #!String
event_robot3: "Heh...$8#$b#Yeah I guess he did kinda say that, didn't he?$l#$b#...Um...$l" #!String
event_robot4: "...$8#$b#@...$8" #!String

event_robot_explain1: "...$s#$b#You have a point, I did program her to act human... but her neural net is so complex, I can't be sure conciousness didn't emerge on its own.$8#$b#Furthermore, isn't it a little arrogant to assume that human-like consciousness is the only worthwhile vessel of existence? Computer brains are different than ours, but that doesn't mean we can disregard them.$8" #!String
event_robot_explain2: "I see. Well it wasn't a very funny joke.$a" #!String
event_robot_explain3: "That's horrible! What's gotten into you, @?$a#$b#I'm just going to forget about this conversation... you aren't acting yourself.$a" #!String
summer_1: "This is going to be a great season for stargazing." #!String
summer_Mon: "Hmm... What sort of gadget should I tinker with this summer?" #!String
summer_Mon6: "Come to my room if you ever want to tinker with my gadgets." #!String
summer_Tue: "Sebastian is my half-brother, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different." #!String
summer_Tue4: "Sebastian hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if he even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a brother but he doesn't act like one." #!String
summer_Wed: "Are you enjoying the season?#$e#It's been so warm this year.$h" #!String

summer_Thu: "Sorry, I was just thinking about some gadgets I'm making.#$q 35/36 Thu_01_old#I've decided I'm going to build a robot someday.#$r 35 30 Thu_0#That should be very easy for you#$r 36 -50 Thu_01_01#You should be more realistic#$r 35 40 Thu_01_02#It sounds challenging" #!String
Thu_01_old: "See you later." #!String
Thu_0: "Really? Are you sure you're not just trying to flatter me?" #!String
Thu_01_01: "You don't think I could do it?$s" #!String
Thu_01_02: "You're right, but I love a challenge!$h" #!String
summer_Sat: "Hey, have any interesting farm stories to tell me?#$e#Guess not." #!String
summer_Fri: "I worked at the clinic yesterday. We didn't have a single patient.#$e#I guess people get sick less during summer." #!String
summer_Sun: "I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.#$b#Dad says a lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year." #!String
summer_Fri2: "Hey, tell me a story about farming.#$e#That's really interesting!" #!String
summer_Wed4: "Is it just me or did it suddenly get really hot?#$e#I guess it's just me." #!String
summer_Sun6: "Some day I'm going to be a world-class inventor.$u#$e#You're lucky to be friends with me!#$b#...just kidding." #!String
summer_Tue8: "@, you're looking sharp today.$h" #!String
summer_Thu10: "How do your hands stay so soft with all that farm work?" #!String
fall_Mon: "Have you explored the mines much? I've heard you can find some useful materials there." #!String
fall_Tue: "The trees look beautiful today!$h" #!String
fall_Thu: "In other parts of the world it's spring right now. Imagine that!" #!String
fall_Wed: "Bleh... I don't feel like working tomorrow." #!String
fall_Fri: "I bet we'll start seeing more people at the clinic this season.$s#$e#I hope everyone stays healthy." #!String
fall_Sat: "All these falling leaves will provide food for mushrooms and other small organisms.$u#$e#Interesting, isn't it?" #!String
fall_Sun: "Hey, here's to another good week! *toast*" #!String
fall_Tue2: "@, I just love how the trees look right now!#$e#I know you like them too." #!String
fall_Wed4: "If you have any extra metal laying around, I could always use it for one of my projects.#$e#But only if you don't need it yourself." #!String
fall_Fri6: "I've been feeling especially optimistic lately...$h" #!String
fall_Mon8: "You should come visit me at the clinic Tomorrow. I work from 10 a.m.to 4 p.m.$h" #!String
fall_Thu10: "You have a leaf in your hair. Let me get it for you.#$e#...$h" #!String
winter_1: "Oh man, it's so cold...$s" #!String
winter_Mon: "Did you see the snowman I built?$h" #!String
winter_Tue: "My hair gets so frizzy in this dry weather. *sigh*" #!String
winter_Wed: "I guess winter is a good time to work on my gadgets.#$e#I wonder if I could make anything useful for farmers?" #!String
winter_Thu: "Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#I would go but my Dad would flip." #!String
winter_Fri: "I hope I don't catch the flu this year." #!String
winter_Sat: "Have you built a furnace yet?#$e#You can use them to turn raw material like ores into more useful products.$u" #!String
winter_Sun: "I get so sleepy when it's cold..." #!String
winter_Sat2: "Hey, if any of your farming machines need to be fixed, just let me know.$h" #!String
winter_Tue4: "Hey, do you have any ideas for a new gadget I can make?#$e#Mhmm. I trust your opinion." #!String
winter_Fri6: "You look fresh today. I guess it's that crisp winter air." #!String
winter_Mon8: "Hi @!$h#$e#Hey, don't you think my snowman looks kind of like you?" #!String
winter_Thu10: "@, come closer. I'm cold.$l#$e#My hands are so dry from the winter air. I'm sorry about that.$l" #!String
